content: > designer monica brown lives atop a hill called queen anne and was inspired by victorian feminity when she was designing this close-fitting blouse the simple stitch pattern is bordered by half_double_crochet and the contrasting bib is crocheted separately and then sewn into the body before being finished off with a mandarin-style collar also for sale 1 at interweave 1 https //www interweave com/store/queen-annes-lace-blouse
